run-1.error_message: Invalid JSON input for tool API-update-a-block: {"block_id":"2552b7e8-cebd-81e0-8347-cedc6f502b66","type":{"heading_1":{"rich_text":[{"text":{"content":"Software Deployment Process"}}]}}}{"block_id":"2552b7e8-cebd-81b6-8d56-dcfc63af689f","type":{"paragraph":{"rich_text":[{"text":{"content":"Created 2025-01-19"}}]}}}{"block_id":"2552b7e8-cebd-81a9-b0e4-e47d8cd9c658","type":{"paragraph":{"rich_text":[{"text":{"content":"Responsible department: DevOps Engineering Team"}}]}}}{"block_id":"2552b7e8-cebd-8173-a516-fa43b5498b55"}{"block_id":"2552b7e8-cebd-8148-8bed-ce17c7dba225","type":{"paragraph":{"rich_text":[{"text":{"content":"This SOP defines the standardized process for deploying software applications to production environments, ensuring zero-downtime deployments, proper rollback procedures, and compliance with security protocols. This procedure applies to all production deployments and must be followed by all engineering teams."}}]}}}{"block_id":"2552b7e8-cebd-8143-9ea1-de7adf9423e0","type":{"paragraph":{"rich_text":[{"text":{"content":"Software deployments are critical operations that can impact system availability and user experience. This process has been developed based on industry best practices and our incident response learnings from Q3 2023. All deployments must go through automated testing pipelines and require approval from designated reviewers."}}]}}}{"block_id":"2552b7e8-cebd-811a-b38c-dac80670b653"}{"block_id":"2552b7e8-cebd-81fb-8925-eedaa72ba0b1","type":{"paragraph":{"rich_text":[{"text":{"content":"Essential deployment terminology for team understanding:"}}]}}}{"block_id":"2552b7e8-cebd-81d0-b929-f6c74e8644b3","type":{"bulleted_list_item":{"rich_text":[{"text":{"content":"Blue-Green Deployment: A deployment strategy that maintains two identical production environments"}}]}}}{"block_id":"2552b7e8-cebd-81f5-bc8f-e2a8df1b8619","type":{"paragraph":{"rich_text":[{"text":{"content":"Critical tools required for deployment operations:"}}]}}}{"block_id":"2552b7e8-cebd-811b-9876-e33e69ac72fc"}{"block_id":"2552b7e8-cebd-8181-ba4a-ecfe757703ab"}{"block_id":"2552b7e8-cebd-8114-8f02-f059dc3b16cc","type":{"paragraph":{"rich_text":[{"text":{"content":"The following roles are essential for successful deployment execution:"}}]}}}{"block_id":"2552b7e8-cebd-81d1-90c2-e01f4ffd0cbb","type":{"bulleted_list_item":{"rich_text":[{"text":{"content":"DevOps Engineer: Executes deployment, monitors system health, initiates rollbacks if needed"}},{"text":{"content":"Lead Developer: Reviews code changes, approves deployment package, validates functionality"}},{"text":{"content":"QA Engineer: Verifies smoke tests, confirms user acceptance criteria"}},{"text":{"content":"Security Officer: Validates security compliance, approves security-sensitive deployments"}}]}}}{"block_id":"2552b7e8-cebd-815c-b729-ddf8c31d30d5","type":{"paragraph":{"rich_text":[{"text":{"content":"Follow these steps in sequence. Do not skip steps or perform them out of order."}}]}}}{"block_id":"2552b7e8-cebd-81a4-a95f-f98a471b928e","type":{"numbered_list_item":{"rich_text":[{"text":{"content":"Pre-deployment: Verify all automated tests pass, obtain required approvals from Lead Developer and Security Officer, confirm rollback plan is documented and tested"}}]}}}{"block_id":"2552b7e8-cebd-81b0-a3a3-f3ba1cd7baf7","type":{"numbered_list_item":{"rich_text":[{"text":{"content":"Deployment execution: Deploy to staging environment first, run comprehensive smoke tests, obtain final Production Gateway approval, deploy to production using blue-green strategy"}}]}}}{"block_id":"2552b7e8-cebd-816f-8a85-f53ea8092e21","type":{"numbered_list_item":{"rich_text":[{"text":{"content":"Post-deployment: Monitor system metrics for minimum 30 minutes, validate all functionality using automated tests, document deployment results in change log, notify all stakeholders via deployment notification system"}}]}}}
